title: WATCHMEN Episode 3 Breakdown, Theories and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment:
What's in the briefcase Laurie?
Laurie: .......🍆

Couldn't help but notice that Keene looked at Laurie with a little bit of shock and anger(?) like, he went to stand next to the cavalry guy way too quickly and the pre-made hole made me think that all that was staged and was supposed to go off without a hitch. Keene looked like he saw a friend die or something.
Keene its a paralel to Adrian Veidt. The funeral scene its like the time when the guy tried to shot Adrian at the lobby.

The ending where the Car almost hits Laura was a play on her own joke to Dr Manhattan.

The joke when she throws the brick in the air and it comes down to hit god on the head  because she uses misdirection to fool him by changing be the joke. In other words the joke was on god and he never saw it coming.

I was waiting for Mr. Shadow to say 
“I am Batman!”
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 3 of HBO's Watchmen. We'll recap, review, point out easter eggs and details you missed of the series based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
